item.description: I have an ongoing group of connected breathing clients who get together to support each other realigning and to become more of who we are. I have led groups since 1998, first as a Transformational Breath facilitator and now certified through the Power of Breath Institute. We meet every other Wednesday evening with profound awareness and healing always.
item.name: Let connected breathers know of this group that is 5 minutes West of Nashua, NH
